author: sbutler
msg: New test: updating a locked file should not cause a tree conflict.

author: rhuijben
msg: Add XFail test that shows how trunk and 1.6 allow breaking the
working copy with 'svn cp' followed by a depth empty commit.
This issue is probably triggered mostly from GUI clients that use svn
status to retrieve modified items and then commit specifically these using
